title: Himi 211
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki hotau Huhu’i,
‘I he’ene fakataha
‘A e kakai tui.
2.
Pea ‘oku fekau ia,
Ki he kakai hao,
Ke tau kumi fakataha
Ki hono fofonga.
3.
Pea ‘oku fekau ia,
Ke tau felangaki;
Pea ke tau loto taha,
‘I he’etau tui.
4.
Ke tau fetokoni’aki,
‘I he ngāue lelei,
‘O fetakinima ‘aki,
Ke tau ‘alu ai pē.
5.
Ko e foaki kuo ma’u,
‘E he toko taha
‘Oku tau fie ongo’i,
Pea fiefia.
6.
Ko e ‘ofa mo’onia,
Ko ia ‘oku tau
Mahalo, mo lea taha
Pea loto taha.
7.
Pea fe’ofo’ofani,
Pea lea lelei,
‘Oku tau feohi leiei,
‘I he’etau tui. *
